title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, October 13, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Harlem Renaissance writer Arnaud "Arna" Wendell Bontemps (1902-1973), who also preserved and anthologized African American literature.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Harlem Renaissance writer Arnaud "Arna" Wendell Bontemps (1902-1973), who also preserved and anthologized African American literature.
